name: event-planner-auth-postman-collections
description: Collections Postman complètes pour tester l'API Event Planner Auth avec RBAC

scripts.validate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const files = ['Event-Planner-Auth-API-Complete.postman_collection.json', 'Users-Module.postman_collection.json', 'Roles-Module.postman_collection.json', 'Additional-Modules.postman_collection.json']; files.forEach(file => { const filePath = path.join(__dirname, file); if (fs.existsSync(filePath)) { console.log('✅', file); } else { console.log('❌', file); } });"

author: Event Planner Team
